Package cs151Project.models

Class WaddleDee

java.lang.Object
cs151Project.models.Entity
cs151Project.models.WaddleDee
public class WaddleDee
extends Entity
An object of the WaddleDee class declares and stores the information needed to program a WaddleDee character into the game. This class keeps track of the state of WaddleDee as well (ie. standing, walking) to supply the proper animations and other program responses.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class cs151Project.models.Entity

    enemyWalk, facing, falling, frames, gravity, handler, height, id, jumping, solid, standTime, velX, velY, walkTime, width, x, y

  • Constructor Details

    • WaddleDee

      public WaddleDee​(int x, int y, int width, int height, int walkBounds1, int walkBounds2, boolean solid, Id id, Handler handler)
      Initializes 1 WaddleDee object with all necessary information.
      Parameters:
      x - x positional value for the image location relative to the game window
      y - y positional value for the image location relative to the game window
      width - width of the WaddleDee image as it appears in the game window
      height - height of the WaddleDee image as it appears in the game window
      walkBounds1 - left-most coordinate limit that the WaddleDee enemy character can walk to
      walkBounds2 - right-most coordinate limit that the WaddleDee enemy character can walk to
      solid - determines if character can pass through other characters or is solid and thus has collision detection code.
      id - the type of character (ie. player, platform, etc.)
      handler - the handler object that contains the information about the level that the character operates in.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method is responsible for drawing the image graphics for WaddleDee.
      Specified by:
      render in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g - this object provides the necessary functions to paint the images to the game window.

    • update

      public void update()
      This function updates the positional values and speed of WaddleDee. It also handles all collision detection between WaddleDee and a Tile type object or between WaddleDee and another Entity type object.
      Specified by:
      update in class Entity
